factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

source.sqlReaderQuery:
--Control de Cargas
INSERT INTO admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SELECT CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE),'CARGA COLOMBIA',DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),1

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionEtapa SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND IDEtapa IN ('DIMENSIONECU','FACTAUDITORIAECU')

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionTabla SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND Tabla IN ('FacSgPorcentual','FacSgPorcentualCentroCosto','FacSgVentaFormaPago','FacSgCierreCaja','FacSgDeposito','FacSgCierreCajaChica','FacSgMatrizAuditoria','FacSgMatrizAuditoriaAcumulada') and IDCadenaSistemaGerente!=29

--Control de Cargas
DELETE FROM admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
WHERE FechaPeriodo = CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'AUDITORIA ECUADOR'

INSERT INTO admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SELECT CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE),'AUDITORIA ECUADOR',DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),NULL,0

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

--Control de Cargas
UPDATE admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SET FechaHasta = DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()), Estado = 1
WHERE FechaPeriodo =  CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'AUDITORIA ECUADOR'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionEtapa SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND IDEtapa IN ('DIMENSIONECU','FACTCONTABILIDADECU')

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionTabla SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND Tabla IN ('FacPyG','FacPyGUniforme','FacPyGContabilidad')
AND Esquema in ('dwh_ecu_cubo','dwh_ecu_conta')

--Control de Cargas
DELETE FROM admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
WHERE FechaPeriodo = CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'REPROCESO PYG ECUADOR'

INSERT INTO admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SELECT CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE),'REPROCESO PYG ECUADOR',DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),NULL,0

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

SET FechaHasta = DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()), Estado = 1
WHERE FechaPeriodo =  CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'REPROCESO PYG ECUADOR'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionEtapa SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND IDEtapa IN ('DIMENSIONECU','FACTCONTABILIDADECU')

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionTabla SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND Tabla IN ('FacPyG','FacPyGUniforme','FacPyGContabilidad')
AND Esquema in ('dwh_ecu_cubo','dwh_ecu_conta')

--Control de Cargas
DELETE FROM admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
WHERE FechaPeriodo = CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'REPROCESO CONTROL PEDIDO ECUADOR'

INSERT INTO admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SELECT CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE),'REPROCESO CONTROL PEDIDO ECUADOR',DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),NULL,0

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

UPDATE admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SET FechaHasta = DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()), Estado = 1
WHERE FechaPeriodo =  CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'REPROCESO CONTROL PEDIDO ECUADOR'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionEtapa SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND IDEtapa IN ('FACTVITOECU')

UPDATE admin_btc.LogEjecucionTabla SET Estado='PENDIENTE'
WHERE Periodo=CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),120) AND Tabla IN ('Freidora','FreidoraLocal','TipoFreidora','UsuarioLocal','FacVito') 

--Control de Cargas
DELETE FROM admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
WHERE FechaPeriodo = CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'VITO ECUADOR'

INSERT INTO admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SELECT CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE),'VITO ECUADOR',DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()),NULL,0

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

--Control de Cargas
UPDATE admin_btc.CargaDataFactory
SET FechaHasta = DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()), Estado = 1
WHERE FechaPeriodo =  CAST(DATEADD(HH,-5,GETDATE()) AS DATE) AND Proceso = 'VITO ECUADOR'

SELECT 'ok' AS Resultado

SELECT
	FechaCarga=GETDATE(),
	FechaDesde=MIN(Fecha),--inicia en enero +1
	FechaHasta=DATEADD(yy, DATEDIFF(yy, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, -1)--termina en diciembre+1
FROM dwh_dim.Tiempo
where AnioNumero52Semanas=year(DATEADD(yy, DATEDIFF(yy, 0, GETDATE())+1, 0))

UPDATE STATISTICS [dsa_ecu_sip].[Cuentas]

UPDATE STATISTICS [dsa_ecu_sip].[PresupuestoVentas]
